alert.note: Alert for Crenshaw (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 11:45AM CDT until April 05 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Crenshaw County in south central Alabama... * Until 1215 PM CDT. * At 1144 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Luverne, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Luverne, Rutledge and Glenwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for south central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for south central Alabama.
